branchCategory.name: 3 Port
branchCategory.description: The SYJA300 is 3 port air operated valve with a small profile that increases design flexibility and minimizes space requirements. It is available in a body ported or base mounted style.

branchItem.name: Valves (All Types)
branchItem.description: <p>A 3 port air operated valve, the SYJA is available in a body ported or base mounted style.  The SYJA's small profile increases design flexibility and minimizes space requirements.</p>

branchItem.name: Manifolds
branchItem.description: The SYJA300 is 3 port air operated valve with a small profile that increases design flexibility and minimizes space requirements. It is available in a body ported or base mounted style.
